verses.verse: At the end <WG3796> of the sabbath <WG4521>, as it began to dawn <WG2020> toward <WG1519> the first <WG1520> day of the week <WG4521>, came <WG2064> Mary <WG3137> Magdalene <WG3094> and <WG2532> the other <WG243> Mary <WG3137> to see <WG2334> the tomb <WG5028>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, there was <WG1096> a great <WG3173> earthquake <WG4578>: for <WG1063> the angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> descended <WG2597> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, and came <WG4334> and rolled back <WG617> the stone <WG3037> from <WG575> the door <WG2374>, and <WG2532> sat <WG2521> upon <WG1883> it <WG846>.
His <WG846> appearance <WG2397> was <WG2258> like <WG5613> lightning <WG796>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> clothes <WG1742> white <WG3022> as <WG5616> snow <WG5510>:
And <WG1161> for <WG575> fear <WG5401> of him <WG846> the keepers <WG5083> did shake <WG4579>, and <WG2532> became <WG1096> as <WG5616> dead men <WG3498>.

And <WG1161> the angel <WG32> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> to the women <WG1135>, Fear <WG5399> not <WG3361>: <WG5210> for <WG1063> I know <WG1492> that <WG3754> you seek <WG2212> Jesus <WG2424>, which was crucified <WG4717>.

He is <WG2076> not <WG3756> here <WG5602>: for <WG1063> he is risen <WG1453>, as <WG2531> he said <WG2036>. Come <WG1205>, see <WG1492> the place <WG5117> where <WG3699> the Lord <WG2962> lay <WG2749>.

And <WG2532> go <WG4198> quickly <WG5035>, and tell <WG2036> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> that <WG3754> he is risen <WG1453> from <WG575> the dead <WG3498>; and <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, he goes before <WG4254> you <WG5209> into <WG1519> Galilee <WG1056>; there <WG1563> shall you see <WG3700> him <WG846>: behold <WG2400>, I have told <WG2036> you <WG5213>.

And <WG2532> they departed <WG1831> quickly <WG5035> from <WG575> the tomb <WG3419> with <WG3326> fear <WG5401> and <WG2532> great <WG3173> joy <WG5479>; and did run <WG5143> to bring <WG518> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> word <WG518>.

And <WG1161> as <WG5613> they went <WG4198> to tell <WG518> his <WG846> disciples <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, Jesus <WG2424> met <WG528> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, All hail <WG5463>. And <WG1161> they came <WG4334> and held <WG2902> him <WG846> by the feet <WG4228>, and <WG2532> worshiped <WG4352> him <WG846>.

Then <WG5119> said <WG3004> Jesus <WG2424> to them <WG846>, Be <WG5399> not <WG3361> afraid <WG5399>: go <WG5217> tell <WG518> my <WG3450> brothers <WG80> to <WG2443> go <WG565> into <WG1519> Galilee <WG1056>, and there <WG2546> shall they see <WG3700> me <WG3165>.

Now <WG1161> when <WG4198> they <WG846> were going <WG4198>, behold <WG2400>, some <WG5100> of the watch <WG2892> came <WG2064> into <WG1519> the city <WG4172>, and showed <WG518> to the chief priests <WG749> all <WG537> the things that were done <WG1096>.

And <WG2532> when they were assembled <WG4863> with <WG3326> the elders <WG4245>, and <WG5037> had taken <WG2983> counsel <WG4824>, they gave <WG1325> much <WG2425> money <WG694> to the soldiers <WG4757>,
Saying <WG3004>, Say <WG3754> His <WG846> disciples <WG3101> came <WG2064> by night <WG3571>, and stole <WG2813> him <WG846> away while <WG2837> we <WG2257> slept <WG2837>.

And <WG2532> if <WG1437> this <WG5124> comes <WG191> to <WG1909> the governor <WG2232>'s ears <WG191>, we <WG2249> will persuade <WG3982> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> secure <WG275> <WG99999> you <WG5209>.

So <WG1161> they <WG3588> took <WG2983> the money <WG694>, and did <WG4160> as <WG5613> they were taught <WG1321>: and <WG2532> this <WG3778> saying <WG3056> is commonly reported <WG1310> among <WG3844> the Jews <WG2453> until <WG3360> this day <WG4594>.

Then <WG1161> the <WG3101> eleven <WG1733> disciples <WG3101> went away <WG4198> into <WG1519> Galilee <WG1056>, into <WG1519> a mountain <WG3735> where <WG3757> Jesus <WG2424> had sent <WG5021> them <WG846>.
And <WG2532> when they saw <WG1492> him <WG846>, they worshiped <WG4352> him <WG846>: but <WG1161> some <WG3588> doubted <WG1365>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> came <WG4334> and spoke <WG2980> to them <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, All <WG3956> power <WG1849> is given <WG1325> to me <WG3427> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> in <WG1909> earth <WG1093>.

Go <WG4198> therefore <WG3767>, and teach <WG3100> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484>, baptizing <WG907> them <WG846> in <WG1519> the name <WG3686> of the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> of the Son <WG5207>, and <WG2532> of the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>:

Teaching <WG1321> them <WG846> to observe <WG5083> all things <WG3956> whatever <WG3745> I have commanded <WG1781> you <WG5213>: and <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, I <WG1473> am <WG1510> with <WG3326> you <WG5216> always <WG2250>, even to <WG2193> the end <WG4930> of the world <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.
